Package com.xceptance.xlt.common.actions

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Downloader
    Loads all the static content stuff with a passed XltWebClient, distributed on some threads.
    HtmlPageAction
    All it does, is loading a WebResponse for a passed WebRequest.
    LightWeightPageAction
    All it does, is loading a WebResponse for a passed WebRequest.
    ModifiedAbstractHtmlPageAction
    This class is simply a variant of the AbstractHtmlPageAction.
    ModifiedAbstractLightWeightPageAction
    This class is simply a variant of the AbstractLightWeightPageAction.
    StaticContentDownloader
    The StaticContentDownloader aids in managing the parallel download of resources.
    XhrHtmlPageAction
    See HtmlPageAction.
    XhrLightWeightPageAction
    See LightWeightPageAction.
